类 Shape

extends java.lang.Object

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Shape

        public Shape(double x,
             double y)
        Creates a new instance of a Shape object with the coordinates of x and y.
        参数:
        x - X-coordinate.
        y - Y-coordinate.
        Precondition:
        all dimensions must be positive.
        Postcondition:
        a shape is created.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getPerimeter

        public abstract double getPerimeter()
        Calculates and returns the parimeter of the shape.
        返回:
        The preimeter of the rectangle.

      • getArea

        public abstract double getArea()
        Calculates and returns the area of the rectangle.
        返回:
        The area of rectangle.

      • isPointInside

        public abstract boolean isPointInside(double x,
                                      double y)
        Determines whether the point x,y is contained inside this rectangle.
        参数:
        x - The X-coordinate of the point.
        y - The Y-coordinate of the point.
        返回:
        True if point is inside, false if point is outside.

      • reset

        public abstract void reset()
        Reset all dimension of a rect to zero.
        Postcondition:
        Side affect: All dimension reset to zero.

      • scale

        public abstract void scale(double factor)
        Scale the shape by the input value.
        参数:
        factor - the factor value.

      • getX

        public double getX()
        Return the x-coordinate of the shape.
        返回:
        x-coordinate.

      • getY

        public double getY()
        Return the y-coordinate of the shape.
        返回:
        y-coordinate.

      • setX

        public void setX(double x)
        Set the x-coordinate as x.
        参数:
        x - the new x-coordinate.
        Postcondition:
        Side affect: The x-coordinate changes to x.

      • setY

        public void setY(double y)
        Set the y-coordinate as y.
        参数:
        y - the new y-coordinate.
        Postcondition:
        Side affect: The y-coordinate changes to y.

      • setStroke

        public void setStroke(java.awt.Color c)
        Set the stroke color.
        参数:
        c - The new stroke color.
        Postcondition:
        Side affect: Stroke color changes to c.

      • setFill

        public void setFill(java.awt.Color c)
        Set the fill color.
        参数:
        c - The new fill color.
        Postcondition:
        Side affect: fill color changes to c.

      • setFilled

        public void setFilled(boolean f)
        Set the shape filled.
        参数:
        f - a boolean that tells if the shape is filled.
        Postcondition:
        the fill state will be updated.

      • setStrokeWidth

        public void setStrokeWidth(int w)
        Set the width of the stroke width.
        参数:
        w - width of the stroke.
        Postcondition:
        width of stroke become w.

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet surface)
        A drawing surface that will set a random color of the shape.
        参数:
        surface - The surface PApplet draws on.
